entry.name: displayJobParameters
entry.comment: This scripts displays the parameters for all the jobs along with their default values (if applicable). Script found at Hudson.

entry.name: listFailedJobs
entry.comment: If you have a lot of job configured on your Hudson installation, you maybe want to have a list of job which last run fails. This script is taken from an article by 'Jan Materne'

entry.name: changeMvnJVMSettingsInFreestyleJobs
entry.comment: This script finds all Maven Tasks registered in freestyle jobs and replace JVM Options by a new value. This script is taken from the Hudson page

entry.name: displayTimerTriggers
entry.comment: This scripts displays the timer triggers for all the jobs in order to better arrange them. Script found at Hudson.

entry.name: displayMailNotificationsRecipients
entry.comment: This script displays for all jobs the list of mail recipients used for notifications. It supports, Standard mail notifications, Maven Jobs Notifications and Mail-Ext plugin. It was tested on Freestyle and Maven projects with Hudson 1.346.. Script found at Hudson.

entry.name: disableSCMTriggerDuringNight
entry.comment: This script lets you easily change all jobs running every minutes so that it gets disabled between 21:00 and 07:00 and on Saturday and Sunday. Script found at Hudson.

entry.name: getThreadDump
entry.comment: Prints a thread dump of the node. Script found at Hudson.

entry.name: Clear build queue
entry.comment: If you accidently trigger a lot of unneeded builds, it is useful to be able to cancel them all
